page.title: 03Nicola's Sunday
page.content: On Sunday morning my sister and I went to Sunday School straight after breakfast. When we came home we had to tidy our bedroom and help mum get the dinner ready. After dinner it was my sister's turn to wipe the dishes, while I played on our skateboard with my brother. We all went a walk right round the reservoir then we had tea early. Sunday night we had a quiz game then I went in the bath.My dad went to work so I watched football for him.Mexico won 1_0.Then at 9 o'clock I went to bed.
